newsitem.title: USA: National TechTeam gets $5 mln Comshare contract.
newsitem.headline: National TechTeam gets $5 mln Comshare contract.

text.p: National TechTeam Inc said Wednesday it has received a $5 million multiyear contract to provide support for Comshare Inc's internal personal computers in Ann Arbor, Mich. and in London, England.

This contract formalizes a relationship which dates from June, 1995 and provides services for desktop PC repair, local area networks, wide area networks, PC-based electronic mail, internet services, and application services on a national and international basis.
National TechTeam provides information technology outsourcing support services to corporations, government agencies and service organizations.
